name: GlobeSecNine
overview: GlobeSecNine is out of business. It is a private equity firm specializing in management buyouts, consolidations, build-ups, and growth capital investments. The firm primarily invests in security, defense, and counter-terrorism with a focus on defense and classified services, port and transportation system security, agriculture, and water and food safety. It seeks to invest in companies located in the United States. GlobeSecNine is based in Arlington, Virginia.
